item.title: compile.37
item.description: build number: 37 re-implement command docker pull elonh/opde:sdk docker run -it --rm elonh/opde:sdk zsh # or bash export http_proxy= # [your proxy], do not use localhost or 127.0.0.1 export https_proxy=$http_proxy opde feeds && opde config -a make package/feeds/packages/mariadb/compile -j$(nproc) || make package/feeds/packages/mariadb/compile V=s Compile.txt Applying ./patches/100-fix_hostname.patch using plaintext: patching file scripts/mysql_install_db.sh Applying ./patches/110-pcre.cmake.patch using plaintext: patching file cmake/pcre.cmake Applying ./patches/130-c11_atomics.patch using plaintext: patching file configure.cmake patching file mysys/CMakeLists.txt patching file sql/CMakeLists.
